mechanisms.title: Cantilever Snap-Fit
mechanisms.summary: Flexible cantilever hook for enclosure closures.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Model a cantilever arm with root fillet, insertion chamfer, and retention undercut. Keep arm thickness and length parametric. Limit strain by using generous root radius and avoid sharp transitions.

mechanisms.title: Snap Hook + Window
mechanisms.summary: Hook feature with matching window receiver for plastic housings.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Create mating hook and receiver window with insertion lead-in and stop faces. Keep clearance and draft parametric. Include anti-overstress relief where possible.

mechanisms.title: Bayonet Lock (Quarter Turn)
mechanisms.summary: L-slot bayonet lock for quick attach/lock mechanisms.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Build male lugs and female L-slots with entry ramp and lock detent at final angle. Keep lug thickness, slot width, and engagement depth parameterized.

mechanisms.title: Dovetail Slide
mechanisms.summary: Self-aligning male/female dovetail slide interface.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Create a trapezoidal dovetail pair with printable overhang angle and insertion lead. Parameterize taper angle, slide length, and fit clearance.

mechanisms.title: Tongue and Groove
mechanisms.summary: Alignment tongue with groove channel for enclosure seams.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Add perimeter tongue and matching groove with controlled depth and corner relief. Keep seam gap and wall-safe offsets parameterized.

mechanisms.title: Living Hinge Strip
mechanisms.summary: Thin flexure hinge strip for repeated bending in suitable materials.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Model a thin hinge web between rigid bodies with stress-relief transitions and bend zone kept clear. Use conservative hinge thickness and radius transitions.

mechanisms.title: Barrel Hinge
mechanisms.summary: Alternating knuckles around a hinge pin axis.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Create alternating hinge knuckles with a through-pin bore and clearance for rotation. Keep knuckle spacing and bore diameter parameterized.

mechanisms.title: Simple Pin Hinge
mechanisms.summary: Two-ear hinge with single bore and pin.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Build mating hinge ears and pin path with filleted roots and rotation clearance. Keep ear thickness and bore offsets parameterized.

mechanisms.title: Detent Ball Seat
mechanisms.summary: Ball detent seat geometry for indexed positions.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Model a detent pocket or groove path for a spring-loaded ball. Use smooth entry chamfers and avoid undercuts that prevent molding/printing.

mechanisms.title: Slider Rail
mechanisms.summary: Linear slider and rail pair with stop features.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Create rail and carriage profiles with controlled side and top clearance, plus end stops. Keep rail height, carriage envelope, and clearances parametric.

mechanisms.title: Linear Bushing Seat
mechanisms.summary: Press-fit/clearance seat for linear bushings.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Model cylindrical seat with chamfered lead-in and anti-crack wall thickness. Parameterize bore tolerance and shoulder depth.

mechanisms.title: Spur Gear Pair
mechanisms.summary: Matched spur gear pair with module and center-distance control.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Generate two spur gears with shared module and proper center distance. Keep tooth count, face width, and bore diameters fully parameterized.

mechanisms.title: V-Pulley Pair
mechanisms.summary: Simple pulley pair for belt transmission studies.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Create pulley pair with groove geometry and center distance. Parameterize groove angle, width, and hub dimensions.

mechanisms.title: Timing Pulley Pair
mechanisms.summary: Toothed pulley pair with synchronized pitch.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Model timing pulleys with synchronized tooth pitch and flange support. Keep tooth pitch, tooth count, and width parametric.

mechanisms.title: O-Ring Face Gland
mechanisms.summary: Face-seal groove for O-ring compression.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Create perimeter gland groove with controlled squeeze and stretch assumptions. Keep groove width/depth and edge clearances parametric.

mechanisms.title: Gasket Channel
mechanisms.summary: Rectangular gasket retention channel around a sealing perimeter.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Add continuous gasket channel with corner radii, compression land, and anti-extrusion lip where needed. Keep channel dimensions and offset parametric.

mechanisms.title: Lip Seal Seat
mechanisms.summary: Seat and shoulder for radial lip seals.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Build radial seal bore seat with insertion chamfer and shaft lead radius. Keep bore tolerance, shoulder depth, and seal land parametric.

mechanisms.title: Screw Boss Pattern
mechanisms.summary: Parametric standoff bosses for screw fastening.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Generate cylindrical bosses with pilot holes, root fillets, and rib-ready spacing. Keep boss OD/ID and offsets parameterized.

mechanisms.title: Heat-Set Insert Boss
mechanisms.summary: Boss optimized for brass heat-set threaded inserts.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Model insert boss with lead-in chamfer and support walls. Keep insert bore, insertion depth, and anti-crack thickness parametric.

mechanisms.title: PCB Standoff Grid
mechanisms.summary: Common PCB standoffs with hole pattern and relief.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Build PCB standoffs in a parametric pattern with screw/pin top geometry and keepout around board edge. Keep hole spacing and standoff height parameterized.

mechanisms.title: Keyhole Wall Mount
mechanisms.summary: Keyhole slot for screw-head wall mounting.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Create keyhole profile with capture diameter and slot throat, plus chamfered entry. Keep screw head diameter assumptions and clearances parametric.

mechanisms.title: USB-C Panel Cutout
mechanisms.summary: Rounded-rect USB-C interface opening with support shelf.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Build USB-C cutout as rounded slot with datum-based placement and optional retention shelf. Keep slot dimensions and shell offsets parameterized.

mechanisms.title: Membrane Button Pocket
mechanisms.summary: Blind pocket for sealed membrane buttons.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Cut a shallow capsule pocket from outer wall while preserving membrane thickness. Keep cut depth and button geometry fully parametric.

mechanisms.title: Reinforced Strap Slot
mechanisms.summary: Pass-through strap slot with local reinforcement pads.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Create through-slot for strap path and add local reinforcement ribs/pads to reduce crack risk. Keep slot dimensions and wall support parameterized.
